data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio do Maritimo have now been confirmed.
The first-half is under way at Estadio do Maritimo - Braga kick-off to start the match.
Tiago Martins signals a Maritimo throw-in in Braga's half.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Nanu of Maritimo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Tiago Martins awards Braga a goal kick.
Goal! Trincao gives Braga a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Ricardo Esgaio to set up the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Braga in Funchal.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Braga.
Goal kick for Braga at Estadio do Maritimo.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Throw-in for Braga at Estadio do Maritimo.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Maritimo needs to be cautious. Braga have an attacking throw-in.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
Can Braga capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ruben Ferreira (Maritimo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ricardo Esgaio returns to the field for Braga after picking up a slight injury.
The match at Estadio do Maritimo has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ricardo Esgaio, who is down injured.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Braga's Trincao is on target but unsuccessful.
Maritimo's Joel gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maritimo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
Daizen Maeda (Maritimo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Maritimo have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
Tiago Martins signals a Maritimo throw-in in Braga's half.
Tiago Martins signals a throw-in for Maritimo, close to Braga's area.
Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Braga.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Paulinho (Braga) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
Ricardo Horta (Braga) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Throw-in for Braga close to the penalty box.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
Tiago Martins awards the home team a throw-in.
Maritimo's Edgar Costa breaks free at Estadio do Maritimo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Braga at Estadio do Maritimo.
Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Franck Bambock (Maritimo) has received a yellow card from Tiago Martins.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
Maritimo are pushing forward but Diego Moreno's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Funchal.
Free kick Braga.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Maritimo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Braga's half?
Throw-in for Braga at Estadio do Maritimo.
Tiago Martins will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Funchal.
Braga's Ricardo Esgaio has been booked in Funchal.
The second-half has commenced. Maritimo with the kick-off.
Braga to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jorge Correa is replacing Franck Bambock for the home team.
Braga's Fransergio gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Maritimo defender.
Throw-in Maritimo.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Tiago Martins awards Braga a goal kick.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Braga to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
Maritimo have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga close to the penalty box.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Braga.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
At Estadio do Maritimo, Fransergio has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Nanu of Maritimo is pulled up for offside.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Maritimo.
Bebeto for Maritimo has been booked by Tiago Martins and receives a first yellow card.
Joao Novais (Braga) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Tiago Martins signals a Braga throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Throw-in Braga.
In Funchal Braga drive forward through Paulinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Joao Palhinha is replacing Fransergio for Braga at Estadio do Maritimo.
Braga push upfield and Trincao gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Maritimo defence.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Maritimo needs to be cautious. Braga have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Maritimo's Joel has run offside.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Tiago Martins signals a Braga throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Attention is being given to Bragaâ€™s Nuno Sequeira and play has been suspended briefly.
Goal! Jorge Correa (Maritimo) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Funchal.
Edgar Costa (Maritimo) has received a first yellow card.
Micael Sequeira (Braga) has taken off Nuno Sequeira who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Wenderson Galeno is the replacement.
Free kick Braga.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Braga.
Tiago Martins awards Braga a goal kick.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
Braga's Paulinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
The home team replace Daizen Maeda with Erivaldo.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Tiago Martins awards the home team a throw-in.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Funchal Maritimo attack through Erivaldo. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Braga push forward at Estadio do Maritimo and Trincao gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Maritimo defence.
Braga's David Carmo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
Micael Sequeira (Braga) is making a third substitution, with Abel Ruiz replacing Ricardo Horta.
Throw-in Braga.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
At Estadio do Maritimo the fourth official shows that 7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Maritimo's Amir Abedzadeh is back in action after a slight knock.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Maritimo have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
In Funchal, Maritimo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Braga in Funchal.
Braga drive upfield and Joao Palhinha gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Maritimo defender.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Braga have a dangerous throw-in.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Funchal. The final score is 1-2.
Getterson is on a sub for Joel for Maritimo.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Funchal to check on Amir Abedzadeh, who is grimacing with pain.
Paulinho puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Paulinho (Braga) gets a yellow card.
